title: Tagline Generator
original_prompt:
This is an emotionally-charged tagline for Nike:
Just Do it

This is an emotionally-charged tagline for Toyota:
Let's Go to Places

This is an emotionally-charged tagline for Wrigley's Doublemint Gum: 
Double your pleasure, double your fun

This is an emotionally-charged tagline for Disneyland: 
The happiest place on Earth

This is an emotionally-charged tagline for De Beers:
A Diamond is Forever

This is an emotionally-charged headline for {CompanyName:Grammarly}, {CompanyDescription:a cloud-based typing assistant that reviewers spelling, grammar, punctuation, clarity, engagement, and delivery mistakes in English. it provides real-time feedback and helps users identify and correct mistakes. Grammarly's product offerings include support for Microsoft Office suite (Word and Outlook), hundreds of desktop native apps (Slack, Discord, and Apple Mail, among others), and web-based applications (Google Docs and WordPress). Grammarly's product also helps users to detect plagiarism and provides suggestions for improving the overall tone and clarity of their writing. Additionally, it can suggest synonyms and other text enhancements. Grammarly also offers an account center to manage your account and subscription and an app center to download other Grammarly product offerings.

Limit the tagline to 5 words or less.

input1_ans: "Write Clearly, Write Confidently" is a powerful tagline that emphasizes the importance of clarity and confidence in writing. It suggests that effective communication is not just about the words used, but also about the assurance behind them. This tagline could resonate well with a company like Grammarly, which focuses on enhancing writing skills and providing tools to improve clarity and confidence in written communication.
input2_ans: It looks like you're looking for a tagline or a slogan. "Perfect Your Words, Every Time" is a great phrase that conveys a sense of reliability and improvement in writing. If you need help refining it or creating variations, feel free to ask!
